quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to stop being being scared and just go for it.
If we let things terrify us, life will not be worth living.
People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear.
We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
Never stop because you are afraid - you are never so likely to be wrong.
Being scared can keep a man from getting killed, and often makes a better fighter out of him.
To be afraid is to behave as if the truth were not true.
There's no purer feeling in the world than being scared.
Stop being afraid of what could go wrong and start being positive about what could go right.
Learning how to face fear really makes you invincible because you stop being scared.
You can only be brave by being afraid. Embrace what you are scared of and shift its energy to destroy your fears.
Being scared isn't the problem. It's not running away that's the hard part.
Sometimes you have to stop being scared & just go for it. Either it will work, or it won't. That's life.
Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
What you are afraid to do is a clear indicator of the next thing you need to do.
Sometime it's good to be scared. It means you still have something to lose.
A man who is not afraid is not aggressive, a man who has no sense of fear of any kind is really a free, a peaceful man.
We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
Being scared is part of being alive. Accept it. Walk through it.
Of the mental hazards, being scared is the worst. When you get scared, you get tense.
Everything worth doing starts with being scared.
There's no point in being scared of just trying.
For some reason, people value being scared less than they value laughing.

Being scared is really a good thing. It's being scared of being scared that's bad. Being scared of walking through your fear, going to a place of true creativity - that's what an artist is, that's what he does. If you do that, then being inspired by your contemporaries or people from the past is really great.
He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
If you push through that feeling of being scared, that feeling of taking risk, really amazing things can happen.
You have decided being scared is caused mostly by thinking.
That's the trouble with being scared all the time. Eventually, people just go numb.
One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end.
